text: Hagi antahiho! Nagra noti kaziga moparegatira zamavare'na ne-e'na, mopama ome atre eme atrema hutegatira maka zamavare tru hugahue. Hagi anampina zamavu suhu vahe'ene, zamaga haviza hu vahe'ene, zamu'ene a'nanene, mofavre antenaku'ma nehaza a'nenea egahaze. Ana hanuge'za Israeli vahera rama'a vahe ete mopa zamirera egahaze.
